content:
/>
VIII.i.2.A.1.a
.
Development Actions Following Claims Folder Review
Development actions following a
Nehmer
claims folder review may include development for
medical evidence
verification of service
dependency
payee status
military pay, and/or
burial information.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Developing Claims Under the Nehmer Stipulation
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
